description.value:
You know the ways of birds and beasts and have gained the right to wear their forms. You add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Form] to your apparition spell repertoire, allowing you to cast it with your apparition spellcasting.

Special If you cast the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Darkened Forest Form] focus spell to turn into a form granted by animal form, you can Sustain it up to 5 minutes instead of its normal duration.
